name: Police Chase (itch) (DevLive)
description:
POLICE CHASE is an endless drive car in this race game you will control the police car and try to avoid colliding with other cars

and the most important thing is that you just play it with ONE FINGER and enjoy racing 

increase your speed by time and try to collect coins and get the score also a challenge to beat the last high score.

the game has 2 POWER UPS you can use the fuel to stay on the high way because the fuel decrease with time 

with every collide you lose one life but don't worry you can add one life by getting the second POWER UP which is a life.
